EmailTemplate.description: This is the standard email template to be used when sending a notification to an Alternative Approver that a Leave Request has been submitted and is awaiting approval
EmailTemplate.name: Standard Email - Leave Request - Alternative Approver - Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT REMINDER: {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c} Leave Requests to approve
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Alternative_Approver_First_Name__c},
You have received this notification because you are the nominated secondary Approver for leave requests in the absence of a primary Approver response.
The cut off for leave request approval is 5.30pm Monday.
Please click below to view and approve/reject all {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c} leave requests for employees who worked last week.
{!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Alternative_Approver_Current_Link_Token__c}
If you require any assistance, please contact your {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c} Consultant or {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event_Support__c} on {!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event_Support_Contact__c}.
Yours Sincerely,
{!tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Event__c.tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c}
